May 16, 1910 D Llandovery Contest (Class B)
Llandovery Contest (Class B) 30 Test Piece Contest Llandovery Contest llandovery-contest-class-b
The Amber Witch [arr. W. Rimmer]
Llandovery, Carmarthenshire, Wales, UK Prizes - 1st £8, 2nd £4, 3rd £2. 4 bands competed.
May 30, 2018, 8:14 p.m. May 30, 2018, 8:17 p.m.

3 Emlyn Collieries David Williams
4 Taibach James Coombes
